{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = Atheros_CB22_(D-Link)_eng_sample_top.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = |caption2 = |pp = |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = Atheros_AR5BCB-00022_(D-Link) |wikipedia = |brand = Atheros |model = AR5BCB |submodelappend = |submodel = -00022 |revision = (D-Link) |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |sernum = |wlclass = AB65 |series = |if = PCMCIA (32-bit) |if_bus_version = |ifconnector = |formfactor = |vendor_id = 168c |device_id = 0012 |subvendor_id = 168c |subdevice_id = 1022 |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = KA22002040012-1,PPD-AR5BCB-00022 |icid = |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = 00:05:5D |chip1 = Atheros;AR5211; |chip2 = Atheros;AR5111; |chip3 = Atheros;AR2111; |chip4 = |antconn = |antenna = |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = |802dot11_protocols = a/b |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 10/03/2002 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This device, an engineering sample for private use, shares the same FCC ID as the [[D-Link DWL-AB650]] and also has a D-Link OUI. ===lspci -nnv dump=== 
06:00.0 Ethernet controller [0200]: Qualcomm Atheros AR5211 Wireless Network Adapter [AR5001X 802.11ab] [168c:0012] (rev 01)
        Subsystem: Qualcomm Atheros Device [168c:1022]
        Flags: bus master, medium devsel, latency 168, IRQ 19
        Memory at f1d00000 (32-bit, non-prefetchable) [size=64K]
        Capabilities: [44] Power Management version 2
        Kernel driver in use: ath5k
===ath5k info dump=== 
ath: EEPROM regdomain: 0x10
ath: EEPROM indicates we should expect a direct regpair map
ath: Country alpha2 being used: CO
ath: Regpair used: 0x10
cfg80211: Calling CRDA for country: CO
ath5k: phy7: Atheros AR5211 chip found (MAC: 0x42, PHY: 0x30)
ath5k: phy7: RF5111 5GHz radio found (0x17)
ath5k: phy7: RF2111 2GHz radio found (0x23)
